mapper.sql: uid, dealid, worksid, level, userid, proportion, price, state, addtime,referee
mapper.update: update tb_distrirecord set dealid = #{dealid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, worksid = #{worksid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proportion = #{proportion,jdbcType=REAL}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, referee =#{referee,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from tb_distrirecord order by addtime desc LIMIT #{offset},#{limit}
